div.p:
Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem primo
die mensis Junij anno quo Supra

the saide day Comperit Williame scherar lytstar with sere thomas
myrtone parsone of Essi Ryne ande requirit with Instance
the aldirman and balyeis his Jugis ordinar that allane litstar
quhilk was warnit to Comper the saide day to ansuer for the
wrangis done to him mycht be callit and fand for Ande eftir the
officiaris passit and resersit the said allan he wald nocht comper the
said day befor' his said Jugis ordinar for ministracion of Justice and
the said William with his forspekar offrit him redy diuers' tymes
to vndirlie the law in al thingis that the said allane hed to say
a propone agane him and als' that he was redy to follow
him for the wrangis done to him And becaus' the said allan
Comperit nocht the said William Solemptlie protestit that
he suld nocht ansuer to the said Allane vnto the tyme his
frendis war present to help him in his matiris and specialie quhill
the saide parsone of Ryne be present

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
octauo die Junij quo Supra

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
Robert blinsel forspekar that dene nicholl sclugy hed
done wrang in the pvnding of Duncan talyouris lande
forthir thane j mark' And that thomas Waus wrangit nocht
in the punding of the said land' and that his possession' was
of waile and to be obeit for ony thing that thai hede
Seyne

The saide day it was deliuerit be the saide assis' that
Jaspar' estirlyne sal resaue fra alexander lindesay x elne
and demi of clathis and pay him his money

The saide day Jonhne Sanclar deponit be his aithe that
witandlie he hed pait to Thome ramsay for
the hors' that thomas menyeis follouit him And atour
the said Jonhne grantit him to pay the said hors' and
thome Ramsay wald mak aithe that he was
nocht for the said hors'

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xv die Junij quo Supra

the saide day the aldirman and balyeis grantit ane vnlaw
to philp Dunbrek for the vpmakin of the barras' befor
the commone kyst in the tolbutht

the saide day Jonet lundoris was in ane amerciament of the
court be ane Suorne assis' Williame blinsel forspekar
for the strubulance of bessy chamer bath in word and deid'
and to amend' as law wil and forber' in tym' to Cum

Eodem die gilbertus tulidef amerciatur per assisam Juratam ex ore Willelmi
blinsel prelocutoris assise pro perturbio thome glenmaluyn Et Idem
thomas amerciatur pro perturbio dicti gilberti et quilibet alteri emendabit
ut iura volunt quequidam emenda consilio refertur

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xix die Junij quo Supra

The saide day Jonhne lammyngtone oblist him be his
vphaldin to stande at the ordinance and deliuerance of
Alexander Rede and Jonhne Colisone anent the debatis betuix
him and patrik ros' In nayme of his wyf movit
for ane annuell Rent et cetera

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxj die
Junij quo Supra

Eodem die Johannes crak conuictus fuit per assisam ex ore Willelmi
blinsel prelocutoris assise pro perturbio Johannis retre Johannis Duncane
et andree Symsone Et Alexander penny amerciatur pro perturbio eorundem
quibus emendabunt ut Jura volunt Et Idem Johannes amerciatur pro
perturbio dicti Johannis crak et Alexandri penny quibus emendabit
ut Jura volunt Attamen prenotacio perturbij incepit in dictis
Johanne crak et Alexandro penny et vtraque pars comparebit in feria
Sexta coram preposito et consilibus pro emenda facienda

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xxij die Junij quo Supra

The saide day it is statut and ordanit be the aldirman
ande consal for the commone profit of the tone according
to the alde louabile consuetude and law of this burghe
that al pynoris and cartaris of gudis within this burghe'
sale haue for ilkan barrell borne fra the key or fra the
schip burd at the key to ony part of this burghe benethe
the braid' guttar' sal ane penny scottis money and for ilkan
barrell bevne the brad guttar tua pennis and for Ilkan chaldir
of lyme Colis salt quhet malt and vthir stuf beneth' the brad guttar to deruardis the vel xij d' and fra it to the bradguttar xvj d'
viij d' and bevne it xvj d' tua s' and for euer byrne beneth' j half
penny and bevne j d' and sua of tunnys and vthiris gudis tunlik
be the consideracion of the aldirman and counsal Ande quha
brekis this statut or ony pont contenit in It salbe secludit
and forbodin the tone thai being conuikit tharintill Ande that
nay persone that Ingeris or Intendis to beir' or cary sic
gudis be stoppit nor Impedit be the pynoris bot that
thai haue fredome tharto and quhais doys in the contrar
and beis conuikit tharof salbe pvnist be the aldirman and consal
ande pay ane vnlaw vnforgevin And that ilkan berar' of
girnal gudis haue ane bande fast at thar' pok and that the pok be
knett and closit or' it cum our' the keill or' bot burd'

The saide day patrik baxtar deponit be his aithe that
he gaf xxiiij vnce of Ry breide weil bakin
clene boutit for j d' and xlviij vnce for ij d'
And' xxvj vnce of quhet brede cleyne boutit
weilbakin muldit and wrocht sufficientlie sesonit
And' the aldirman and consal thareftir riplie avisit ordanit
al baxtaris to haue redy baking ry breid' wele
boutit clene fresche and Sufficientlie bakin the penny
breid' weing xxiiij vnce and tua penny breid' xlviij
vncez and the quhet breid' xxvj vnce the tua penny
bred' and xiij vnce the penny breid' vndir the payne
of law

the xj day of Julij the yer forsaid' Jonhne Sanclar grantit
him avand' to alexander Cultis of ouchtirtoule iij li' and xxx d'
quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiij die
mensis Julij quo supra

Eodem die Johannes Colly and Johannes malisone quilibet eorum
amerciatur per assisam ex ore Johannis mar' prelocutoris assise pro perturbio
Andree bety Cuj emendabunt ut Jura volunt et quilibet
ipsorum dabit dimidium libre cere ad lumen Sancti sanguinis et
si aliquis ipsorum perturbium dicto andree fecerit in postrum et indo inde
conuictus fuerit soluet x s' fabrice ecclesie sine remissione

The saide day sere Jonhne ruthirfurd aldirman of this burghe
deliuerit and Ingaf his compt of the malys of the Witsonday
and martimes termez bigan with the quhilkis he Intromettit with
of the common' gudis of this towne of the hale yer' to the
Counsale present for the tyme quhilkis covnt rekning and
pament being rede sene and vndirstandin be the balyeis
and counsale and layd' within the consalhous thai fand'
the said' covnt and rekning deulie maid' and al thar' common'
gudis and malis with the quhilkis the said aldirman Intromettit with
disponit in thar' commone vys' and at thar commavnd' of the quhilkis
thai dischargit and quiet'clamit the saidez aldirman his ayris executouris
and assignais for tham and thar' Successouris now and foreuire for ale
the saide yeris Resat

The saide day sere Jonhne ruthirfurd aldirman Inmediatlie eftir
his covnt was maid' and deliuerit to the towne of the haile yer'
bigane Exponit to the Consale how he hed nay common' gudis
tile expone in thar' vys' and warnit thame tharof becaus' thar was
akis tharof maid' obefor' that the aldirman for the tyme sald' nocht superex
pend' tham bot warne thame quhene thar commone gudis was
done that thai mycht provid' for thame Self

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xx die mensis Julij anno
quo Supra

The said' day the hall tone warnit be the hand'bell and be the officiaris
throw the tone balyeis Consal and communite gathtreit and Circualy Inquirit
be philp of Dunbrek officiar' grantit to set and to maile lat to sere
Johne ruthirfurd' aldirman ane half nethis fischingis of the Raik for fyve
yeris Inmediatlie eftir this generall assedacioun of the said' burghe Instant be
Runnyn' Entirand' in and with the said' demi nethis fischingis one the vigile of
Sanct Androw in the yer' of god jM and fyve hundretht yeris And' frathinfurtht
the said' knicht his ayris or assigniz' to Joys' the said' demi nethis fischeingis with
the pertinencis quhile fyve yeris be Runnyn and langar gif the termes of thar next asse
dacioun generale to be maid' happinnis to be set for siclik maile and girssom'
as vthiris pais for siclik takis Ande chesit Robert blinsele Johne Cullan
Alexander Rede Johne Colisone and thomas prat commissaris to set the said' demi nethis fischingis
And' atour thai consentit to Set al thar' small Customes of the said' burghe to alexander
menyes maile fre for thre yeris eftir his assedacioun tharapon be Runnyn for his
Costis and expensis maid' quhen he Raid' with the said' Aldirman to Edinburghe to help
to fute the covntis of the tone in the kingis Rollis of al yeris bigan And' ordanit
commission' to be gevin vndir thar' common' sele to the said' commissaris to bath the saide
assedacionez' to be maid' in dew forme

Be It kend' tile al mene be thir present lettres vs aldirman balyeis consale and comunite of abirdene
our availe in that part seyne considerit and vndirstandin to haue Set and to maile lattin And' be thir
present lettres settis and to maile lattis tile our hartlie louet nychtbour' sere Johne ruthirfurd' knicht al and
haile the fischingis of ane half neth' of the raik one the wattir of Dee for ale the termes
of fyve yeris immediatlie to be runnyn eftir the vsche and end' of this our last general asse
dacioun' Instant and forthir gif the next our generale assedacioun to be maid' prop happinnis to proport
for gret seruice labouris gratuyteis and thankis done tile vs in tym of the making of thir
lettres To be haldin and hed ale and hale the said' demi nethis fischingis with the pertinencis to the
said' knicht his ayris and assignez' with ale and Sindrie fredomes Commoditeis asiamentis
and proffitis pertening or may pertene tharto The entre of the said' knicht his ayris or assignais
salbe in and with the said' demi nethis fischingis one the vigile of Sanct Androw in the
yer' of god jM and fyve hundretht yeris Ande frathinfurtht to Joys' and bruk the
samyn peciabile quhil ale the termes of fyve yeris and langar gif our saide generale asse
dacioun happinnis to proport but ony Impediment question' or demavnd' to be maid'
in the contrar' of vs or ony vthiris our ayris Successouris or assigniz' but fraude or
gile the saide knicht his ayris or assignez' payand' tile vs and our Successouris yerlie
Sex li' x s' v d' of maile at the termes vsuale within the saide burghe and siclik
girssome as vthiris pais for siclik tak alanerly for ale vthir thingis that may be
askit or Requirit tharof Induring the said' termes And' we the said' balyeis
Counsal and communite of abirdene and our Successouris sal warand' keip and defend' the said'
half nethis fisching with the pertinencis to the said' knicht his ayris and assigniz' for ale the
termes of fyve yeris and langar gif our next general assedacioun to be maid'
happinnis to be Sett In maner and forme as said' Is be al our gudis present and to
Cum agannis al dedly ale fraud' and gile avay put In witnesing of the quhilkis
to thir our' lettres entiring we haue appensit our common sele at the said' burghe the
xx day of Julij the yer' of god jM iiijC nyntj and Aucht yeris

add.foreign: Copia assedacionis facte Johanni ruthirfurd' preposito

div.p:
Be it kend til al mene be thir present lettres ws aldirman balyes consal
and communite of Abirdene our avale in that part seyne considerit and vndirstandyn'
to haue Set and to maile lattyn And' be thir presentis lettres Settis and
to maile lattis tile our Richt hertlie louet nychtbur' and aldirman sire Jonhne
ruthirfurd' knycht al and hal the fischingis of ane half neth' of the Raik
vpone the wattir of Dee for al the termes of fyve yeris immediatlie
to be runnyn eftir the vsche and ende of this our last general asseda
cion Instant and forthir gif the said' generale assedacion to be maid' proportis for his gret labouris gratuyteis and thankis done to ws in
tyme of the making' of thir lettres To be haldin and hed al and haile the
said' demi nethis fischingis with the pertinence to the said' knicht our aldirman
his ayris and assignez' girssome free with al and Sindrie fredomes Commoditeis asiamentis
and profitis quhatsumeuere pertening or onywis' may pertene tharto the Entre of the
said' knicht his ayris or assigniz salbe in and with the said' demi nethis fischingis
one the vigile of Sanct Androw in the yer of god jM ande fiwe hundrethis
yeris and frathinfurtht to Joys' and bruk the samyn peciabile quhil the
termes of fiwe yeris and forthir gif the said general assedacion to be maid' proportis
but ony Impediment question' or demavnd of vs our successouris ayris or assignais or ony vthiris to be maid'
in the Contrar' ale fraude and gile avay put Of the quhilkis demi nethis fischingis
we gravnt vs to haue resavit be the handis of the said' knicht sex li' x s' v d'
vsual money of Scotland' for the formaile of the first yeris fischingis of
the quhilkis first yeris male we hald vs wele content and dischargis ande
quiet'clamys the said' knicht his ayris executouris and assignez' now and foreuire of the
said' yeris male and of the girssome of the said' demi nethis for al the termes
forsaid' And' frathinfurtht the said' knicht his ayris or assignis payand' yerlie tile vs or our successouris
Indurand' the said' termes Sex li' x s' and v d' of maile at the termes vsual
within the said' burghe Alanerlie for al vthir thingis that may be askit or
requirit tharof And' we the said' aldirman balyeis consal and communite of Abirdene
and our Successouris sal varand' kep and defend' the said demi nethis fischingis
of the Raik girssome fre for al the termes of fiwe yeris and langar gif
the next assedacion proportis to be maid' In manir and forme as said'
is to the sad' knicht his ayris and assignez' now and foreuir be al our landis
and gudis present and to cum Aganis al dedlie al frad' and gil avay put
In witnesing of the quhilkis our common sel is appensit to our lettres
at Abirdene the xx day of Julij the yer of god jM iiijC nynty and
aucht yeris

head.add: Copia commissionis facte Johanni ruthirfurd militi

div.p:
Vniuersis pateat per presentes nos' balliuos burgenses et communitatem burgi de
abirdene vnanum consensu et assensu vtilitate nostra vndique pensata
fecisse constituisse et ordinasse necnon tenor' presencium facere
constituere et ordinare nostros dilectos conburgenses Robertum blinsel
Johannem Cullane Alexandrum Rede Johannem Colisone et thomam
prat nostros legittimos commissarios ac deputatos speciales dan'
et conceden' eisdem nostram liberam et omnimodam presentatem
Irreuocabilem ac mandatum speciale pro nobis et nomine nostri totas piscarias
nostras dimidij Rethis de Raik super aquam de Dee assedare
et ad firmam dimittere Inmediate post completum et terminum istius generalis
assedacionis nostre Instan' honorabili viro Johanni ruthirfurd militi nostro conburgensi
pro teminis quinque annorum et vlterius sibi nostra generalis assedacio proficiend'
longiores terminos proportauerit cuius quondam militis heredem suorum aut assignare
Introitus erit ad huiusmodi piscarias in vigilia Sancti Andree apostoli anno
Domini Millesimo quingentesimo quequidam vigilia est terminus et finis istius nostre
generalis assedacionis Instantis Et generaliter omnia alia et singula faciendi gerendi
et excercendi que In premissis et circa ea necessaria fuerint seu oportuna
Promittens nos Ratum gratum firmum et stabilum habius et habiturum tocij et quicquid
dicti commissarij nostri in premissis duxerint faciend' sub ypotheca et obligacione
omnium bonorum nostrorum mobilium et immobilium presencium et futurorum In cuius rei testimonium
Sigillum nostri communione presentibus est appensum Apud Abirdene xxo die mensis Julij anno Domini
Mo CCCCo quadringentesimo nonagesimo Octauo
